pkgmetadata.longdescription: Seamless Access to World Bank International Debt Statistics (IDS) // Access and analyze the World Bank's International Debt Statistics (IDS) https://www.worldbank.org/en/programs/debt- statistics/ids. IDS provides creditor-debtor relationships between countries, regions, and institutions. 'wbids' enables users to download, process and work with IDS series across multiple geographies, counterparts, and time periods.
